ygData.subject: RE: Lesser Fay
ygData.msgSnippet: The clockwork is part of a quest.  I believe that the quest is from Manik in the Gemchopper area, but I could be wrong.  Usually he s guarded by a lot of
ygData.messageBody:
The clockwork is part of a quest. I believe that the quest is from Manik in
the Gemchopper area, but I could be wrong. Usually he's guarded by a lot of
fairies (a LOT of NASTY fairies), but somebody probably lured him to the
zone. You're supposed to kill him (to prevent fairies from getting gnome
technology) and bring back proof of killing him.

The observatory has always been there. It's part of the lens quest.

-----Original Message-----
From: D. F. [mailto:led_orc@...]
Sent: Friday, October 29, 1999 1:39 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Lesser Fay


From: "D. F." <led_orc@...>

Has anyone ever heard of a gnome clockwork NPC called Cognoggin? I was
leaving Steamfont and he was sitting right by the zone border in Lesser Fay.

He conned blue to me at 18, and since he didn't respond to my hails, I
promptly killed him. I was afraid that he would drop my faction with people

in Ak'anon, but it dropped with fairies instead. All he had for loot was a
rusty short sword. I have never heard of him nor seen him before today, has
anyone else?

Also, has there always been a gnome observitory in Lesser Fay? I don't ever
remember seeing it there.

Xisten
